summary: A set of retextured shields using KEBW1144 designs
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]-MJvfLFwIZQ[/youtube][/center]

I'm a major, major, MAJOR fan of KEBW1144's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13429]design of the nords[/url] banners. However I was feeling bored having to always see the same old vanilla guard shields and I wanted my guards shields to match the new banners. I know KEB had mentioned plans to work on his own shields to go with his mod.

It hasn't come though I am hoping he will get his version out sometime soon when he gets free time.

My mod is meant to be a temporary place holder till Keb gets his shields done.

The Artwork is 100% what KEB had gotten off DeviantArt. They are his color schemes, everything. All I did was make them shield compatible.

If KEB does not want this mod up, I will take it down, no questions Asked.
author: Foxia

files.name: Design of the Nords Shields v1
